title: Treasury Yields Briefly Top 3% Ahead of Fed Meeting
sub_head: Pfizer, Starbucks and Lyft are due to post earnings
body:
Stock futures and government bonds wavered as investors geared up for the Federal Reserveâ€™s policy decision and a batch of earnings.
Futures for the S&P 500 flicked between muted gains and losses. The benchmark stocks gauge rose 0.6% Monday, its third gain in four trading days. Technology-focused Nasdaq-100 and Dow Jones Industrial Average futures ticked up less than 0.1% Tuesday.
